alert.note: Alert for Glascock; Warren (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Laurens, northwestern Emanuel, southeastern Warren, eastern Glascock, southeastern Washington, Johnson and Jefferson Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Bastonville to Davisboro to near Oconee, and moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Louisville, Wrightsville, East Dublin, Wrens, Wadley, Davisboro, Tennille, Harrison, Stapleton, Bartow, Oconee, Avera, Riddleville, Kite, Spann, Grange, Stapletons Crossroads, Pringle and Lovett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
